scripts.dev: export AWS_PROFILE=appi && export TABLE_NAME=serophin && export BA_APP_ID=serophin && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n hono,vite,tsc -c blue,magenta,yellow "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:typecheck"
scripts.build:lambda: rm -rf dist cdk.out && npm run typecheck && tsx scripts/build/main.ts
scripts.s3:sync:audio: aws s3 sync static/audio s3://serophin-static/static/audio --cache-control "max-age=31536000" --delete --profile appi
scripts.s3:sync:static: aws s3 sync dist/static s3://serophin-static/static --cache-control "max-age=31536000" --delete --profile appi
scripts.deploy: export AWS_PROFILE=appi && npm run build:lambda && npx cdk deploy --profile appi --require-approval never && npm run s3:sync:static && npm run invalidate
